::Zardus::

Zardus flies into the clearing with the Ark in it, looking around for the 
source of the gunfire. He sees none. He raises his comm-link to his mouth.

"Liono," he says into it, sending the transmission to the maximal leader, 
"Hell Beast, Megatron, and I are at the Ark. I believe it would be easier to 
conduct the negotiations here."
